title: Write a concise, SEO-friendly title for the article using the main keyword. Never rewrite any heading provided below.

introduction.teaser: Write a teaser paragraph (2–3 sentences) introducing the topic and setting the context.
introduction.nlp_answer: Write a concise (max 300 characters) NLP-optimized answer. If the title is a question, bold the actual answer.
introduction.extended_answer: Restate the question clearly. Provide a detailed, direct answer. If the article is list-based, describe the first item. No ambiguity, no yes/no-only answers.
introduction.hook2: Write 2–3 sentences that motivate the reader to continue reading — promise value or surprising info coming next.

headings_content.description: For each heading in the provided list, write one clear and structured response. Do NOT change the heading text. Use the following rules to write each section.

template.heading: Do not modify — this field will be filled with the provided heading
template.paragraph: Write 150–200 words expanding on this heading. Start by restating it in context. Avoid redundancy with previous sections.
template.reader_expectation: Anticipate and respond to the reader’s likely question after the previous section. Keep the flow logical.
template.structure_aids: If useful, include one of the following: a list, short quote, table, example or reference to an image. Avoid blocks longer than 3 lines.
template.clarity: Avoid vague filler text. Be precise and helpful.

conclusion.summary: Wrap up the article with ~150 words. Recap the overall value, what the reader learned, and reassert the key message.
conclusion.closing_sentence: Finish with a positive or actionable sentence that encourages or reassures the reader (e.g., 'Now you know everything to...').

faq_description: Answer common related questions that may still be in the reader’s mind after reading the article.

faq.question: Frequently asked question 1
faq.answer: Answer in about 150 words with clarity and usefulness.

faq.question: Frequently asked question 2
faq.answer: Another detailed answer to a common concern.
